text:
December 1, 1939
Mr. M. 8. Novik
Municipal Broadcasting System
New York City, New York
Dear Novik;
Sorry to hear of your illness. Hope you
have the little bugs whipped by now.
Thanks for all your trouble and I trust
you and Evans can iron things out to our
satisfaction.
You might be interested in the enclosed
copy of a letter I have written to His
Honor.
Cordially yours,
Prank E. Sohooley
